oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Organic Centre Wales Factsheet 20: Understanding the consumer and increasing sales
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Anon,
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Education, extension and communication
Markets and trade
Consumer issues
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This Factsheet summarises the findings of the Taylor Nelson Sofres report: ‘Organic Food: Understanding the Consumer and Increasing Sales’. Issues covered are retail sales, market trends, household spending, marketing recommendations and a list of marketing support contacts for Welsh organic businesses.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Anon, (2004) Organic Centre Wales Factsheet 20: Understanding the consumer and increasing sales. Organic Centre Wales.
